title: Compile C# like C++?
content: After reading the ins and outs of compilation differences between C# and C++ , my question is, cant we compile the C#application (or dll) with Visual Studio (or with other program), so similarly to C++ it stripped out many information during compilation and made an app which will be hard for decompilation like C++ file.
